detail_desc: Relaxed-fit top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in stretch fabric. High waist with concealed elastication and legs with sewn-in creases at the front and raw-edge hems.

Fully lined swimsuit with a low neckline front and back, removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and concealed elastication under the bust. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The polyester content of the swimsuit lining is recycled.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a faux fur-lined hood with a detachable, foldover faux fur trim. Zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front, a drawstring at the waist, side pockets with press-studs and a zipped sleeve pocket. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent with a drawstring. Quilted lining.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Hat in braided paper straw containing glittery threads decorated with pompoms and a thin cord with a bow. Frayed edge around the brim.
Skinny-fit treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a V-neck at the back and buttons down the back. Gathered seam and decorative bow at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight, slightly wider legs.
Short, double-breasted trench coat in grained imitation leather with notch lapels, a tie belt at the waist and welt side pockets. Lined.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, thin shoulder pads, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with a short slit at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Metal keyring with a carabiner hook and shimmering imitation leather pendant.

Sports bra in patterned fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back in ventilating mesh and elasticated hem with transparent sections. Medium support. 86% of the polyester is recycled.
Short-sleeved dress in a cotton weave with an opening and a button at the back of the neck and frilled shoulders.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a motif. Longer and rounded at the back.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Brushed inside.
Short, straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with a wider neckline and short sleeves. Unlined.
Double-layered hat in soft, patterned jersey.
Sports bras in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back with sections in ventilating mesh, and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Wide jumper in a cool, fine-knit viscose blend with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long, narrow sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill. High waist with elastication at the sides, a zip fly and buttons, and side, back and leg pockets.
Short 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hem.
Joggers in heavy sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Hooded top in cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Utility shirt in cotton twill with a turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and two flap chest pockets with a pleat and press-stud. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Joggers in soft denim made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. High, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets and back pockets. Relaxed fit with straight legs and elasticated hems.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Trousers in cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and front and back pockets.

Set with a shirt, slipover and tie. Shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Easy-iron finish. Slipover in a cotton knit with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem. Tie with an adjustable elastic strap.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a chest pocket, embroidery at the top and short sleeves with frill trims.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small collar, V-neck and gathered yoke at the back. Gathers at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Metal hoop earrings with sparkly stones. Diameter 4 cm.
Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with lace. Opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads, elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Trousers in soft fleece with contrasting colour details, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Brogues with a decorative welt seam around the soles, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Fitted top in crinkled jersey with smocking at the front and back and short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a boat neck and gathers at the sides for best fit.
Puffer jacket in nylon with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Narrow, elasticated trim around the hood, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short, crinkled jersey top in a narrow cut at the top with short, spaghetti shoulder straps and a racer back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Shorts in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly with decorative buttons. Diagonal side pockets and a back pocket.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Blouse in an airy weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Sports joggers in heavy jersey with taped details. Elasticated, drawstring waist and zipped side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for added mobility and wide ribbing at the hems. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.
Short 5-pocket skirt in patterned stretch denim with a zip fly and button.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Calf-length jumpsuit in soft slub cotton jersey with concealed press-studs at the back of the neck, a flounce in a broderie anglaise weave over each shoulder, and an elasticated seam at the waist.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and V-neck opening with ties at the top. Long raglan balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a skirt with seams. Lined.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a stand-up collar and drawstring hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, side pockets with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and a press-stud at the cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Unlined.
Metal earrings with decorative plastic stones. Size 2 cm.
Short 5-pocket skirt in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted mirrored lenses.
Ankle-length chinos in stretch cotton with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hems with creases.
WILLIAM MORRIS & CO. x H&M. Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in woven fabric with elastication around the top and short sleeves with ties. Elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Set with a sleeveless romper suit and T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey. Romper suit with press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbed hems.
Wide, gently draping trousers in a soft, fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Regular, elasticated waist.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.

Set with a long-sleeved jumper and pair of joggers in soft, jacquard-knit cotton. Jumper with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Top in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Shaping. 5-pocket bootcut jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist with a zip fly and button.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a foldover shaft and soft terry inside. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Bra in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, decorative elastic straps at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
High-waisted trousers in soft twill with a tie belt and concealed zip in one side. Side pockets, fake welt pockets at the back and straight, wide legs with creases.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Swimming goggles with plastic frames, tinted lenses and an adjustable silicone strap at the back.
Padded gilet with a detachable, padded hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Rounded hem. Lined.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck and frilled collar with sewn-in ties. Buttons at the top and short butterfly sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
Scarf knitted in soft cashmere with ribbing on the short sides. Size 50x175 cm.
Fine-knit hooded jumper in a soft viscose blend with a motif on the front, long sleeves with gathered seams, and a drawstring at the hem.
Sports trousers in sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped side pockets, a mesh section at the crotch and wide ribbing at the hems.
Fitted top in heavily draping ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with short sleeves. Ribbed trims around the neckline, sleeves and hem.

Knee-length nightdress in soft jersey with cap sleeves. Deep, lace-covered V-neck for easier nursing access and a gathered seam under the bust. The nightdress can be worn both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards. The cotton content of the nightdress is organic.

Sandals in thick, twisted rope that is knotted at the sides. Canvas insoles made from a linen and cotton blend, and soles with twisted rope trims around the sides and fluting underneath. Height of soles 1.5 cm.
